title: Wahiz CTW defence w/ Borrah

replies.body: Too complicated for scrims, you don't need to have some big amazing defense. Because that stops your team from rushing on that side, or stopping others
replies.body_tagged: Too complicated for scrims, you don't need to have some big amazing defense. Because that stops your team from rushing on that side, or stopping others

replies.body: How long does that take to build?
replies.body_tagged: How long does that take to build?

reply_to.body: How long does that take to build?
reply_to.body_tagged: How long does that take to build?

replies.body: I doubt it took 10 minutes to build that defence. Even if it did (in creative), in scrims you would not be able to build that quick enough and be able to do everything in that because of people constantly rushing you. Most of it is good but just make it more simple and realistic.
replies.body_tagged: I doubt it took 10 minutes to build that defence. Even if it did (in creative), in scrims you would not be able to build that quick enough and be able to do everything in that because of people constantly rushing you. Most of it is good but just make it more simple and realistic.

replies.body: Looks good, good to have an end product in mind when building it.
replies.body_tagged: Looks good, good to have an end product in mind when building it.
